name: RADARjAM
summary: Radarjam consists of the constant unpredictability of your enemy's location. Dodge what you can't see in your radar equipped fighter! But beware, the enemy advances at every step! Dogfight with enemy Fighters, Hellmakers, Heat Seekers, Carriers, Bombers and more! Unlock new ships with each run that can devastate your enemy with entirely different shooting and movement mechanics!
